ComicInfo.Summary:
"Stunning" . . . "incredible" . . . "an absolute must-buy" . . . these are just some of the words readers are using to describe Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER. And wait 'til they see the amazing fifth issue! In The Paradoxman, Tristan Caine's latest therapy session turns disturbingly ugly after he recounts the evolution of the TCI time chip and the resulting global war. In Young Gods, BWS himself steps on stage to interrupt the Gods' diversions of comet-counting and dragon-seeking after things get a bit out-of-hand. In The Freebooters, Axus the Great is in a grumpy mood brought on by an unwelcome guest, and his remedy is a call to action and adventure! The wit and artistry of Barry Windsor-Smith shift well into fifth gear in this incredible issue of this series!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/barry-windsor-smith-storyteller-5/4000-43335/
ComicInfo.Title: The Paradoxman: Chapter Five; Young Gods: Chapter Five; The Freebooters: Chapter Six
